attributes.action: ensure that, on the occasion of her death, under no circumstances will a State Funeral be granted to Baroness Thatcher of Kesteven in the County of Lincolnshire
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: State funerals are rightly granted to people loved by the nation for their service to the nation, like Nelson, Wellington, Darwin, etc.  Not to people who are reviled by a large proportion of the population.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
